name: ext_R4B_ProdCharacteristic
title: Cross-version Extension for R4B.ProdCharacteristic for use in FHIR R3
description: This cross-version extension represents ProdCharacteristic from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ProdCharacteristic|4.3.0 for use in FHIR R3.

element.short: The marketing status describes the date when a medicinal product is actually put on the market or the date as of which it is no longer available
element.definition: Optional Extension Element - found in all resources.

constraint.human: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children
Must have either extensions or value[x], not both

element.short: xml:id (or equivalent in JSON)
element.definition: unique id for the element within a resource (for internal references). This may be any string value that does not contain spaces.
